title: rust-http2: HTTP/2 implementation in Rust/tokio
author: guifortaine
content:
readme.md rust-http2http/2 client server implementation rust based tokio.currently is used base implementation grpc-rust.example servercheckout source code execute command:cargo run --example serverserver be available https://localhost:8443/. need modern browser http/2 support open page (e. g. firefox, safari, chrome).server works http/2, browser doesn't send http/2 preface, server closes connection.example clientcargo run --example client https://google.com/result is::status: 302cache-control: privatecontent-type: text/html; charset=utf-8referrer-policy: -referrerlocation: https://www.google.ru/?gfe_rd=cr&ei=mzq4wzfagisdzozoktgocontent-length: 257date: thu, 08 jun 2017 00:04:41 gmtalt-svc: quic=":443"; ma=2592000; v="38,37,36,35"302 moved

302 moved

document has moved< href="https://www.google.ru/?gfe_rd=cr&ei=mzq4wzfagisdzozoktgo">here.
